Pekasam Ikan, Makanan Wali Songo yang Hadir Tiap Maulid Nabi di Cirebon
04 Nov 2019, 09:00 by Sudirman Wamad - detikFood


Foto: dok. detikFood/Sudirman Wamad

Cirebon - Keraton Kasepuhan Cirebon membuat sajian makanan untuk perayaan maulid nabi pada Sabtu (9/10/2019) mendatang. Sajian ini bernama bekasem ikan atau pekasam ikan.Proses pembuatan pekasam ikan atau asinan ikan membutuhkan waktu lebih dari sebulan. Awalnya, daging ikan yang digunakan untuk pekasam ikan diawetkan terlebih dahulu di dalam gentong. "Dibuatnya sejak tanggal lima bulan safar, kemudian kita buka gentong berisi ikan itu tanggal lima mulud (rabiulawal), hari ini," kata salah seorang abdi dalem Keraton Kasepuhan Cirebon, Satu saat berbincang dengan detikcom di Keraton Kasepuhan Kota Cirebon, Jawa Barat, Senin (4/10/2019).

Foto: dok. detikFood/Sudirman Wamad

Lebih lanjut, Satu mengatakan daging ikan yang diawetkan dalam gentong dicampur dengan bahan lainnya, seperti garam, gula dan nasi. Satu mengatakan jenis ikannya yang digunakan untuk sajian pekasam adalah ikan layar."Gentongnya kita tutup rapat. Supaya lalat tidak bisa masuk, kalau ada lalat bahaya nanti tidak jadi," kata Satu.detikcom menyaksikan proses pembukaan gentong berisi asinan ikan tersebut. Bau khas daging ikan yang telah difermentasikan dalam gentong begitu menyengat. Kemudian, sejumlah wanita dari keluarga keraton membersihkan satu per satu daging ikan yang sebelumnya diawetkan dalam gentong. Usai dibersihkan, daging ikan tersebut dijemur.


Foto: dok. detikFood/Sudirman Wamad

Usai dijemur, lanjut Satu, daging ikan tersebut dimasak untuk dijadikan sajian saat perayaan maulid atau ritual panjang jimat nanti. "Prosesnya sama, tidak pernah berubah sejak zaman dahulu. Orang yang membuat bekasem ini diwariskan secara turun temurun.Sementara itu, Sultan Sepuh XIV Keraton Kasepuhan Pangeran Raja Adipati (PRA) Arief Natadiningrat mengatakan pekasam ikan merupakan sajian khusus saat ritual panjang jimat. Pekasam ikan merupakan salah satu makanan untuk Wali Songo.


Foto: dok. detikFood/Sudirman Wamad

"Jadi dulu itu Wali Songo makannya ikan. Terus karena Cirebon juga kota pesisir, dan kalau di Arab kan mungkin daging kambing atau unta. Kalau di sini ikan," katanya.Lebih lanjut, Arief menyebutkan pekasam ikan tersebut disajikan menggunakan piring pusaka yang sudah cuci melalui ritual siraman panjang.

Pekasam Ikan, Food of Guardian Songo who attends each birthday of the Prophet in Cirebon
Nov 04 2019, 09:00 by Sudirman Wamad - detikFood


Photo: dock. detikFood / Sudirman Wamad

Cirebon - The Kasepuhan Palace of Cirebon made a meal for the celebration of the Prophet's birthday on Saturday (9/10/2019). This dish is called fish cake or fish pekasam. The process of making fish pekasam or pickled fish takes more than a month. Initially, fish meat used for fish pekasam is preserved first in the barrel. "Made since the fifth safar month, then we open the barrel containing the fish on the fifth mulud (rabiulawal), today," said one of the courtiers of the Kasepuhan Palace in Cirebon, one while chatting with AFP at the Kasepuhan Palace in Cirebon, West Java, Monday (4/10/2019).

Furthermore, Satu said that fish meat preserved in a barrel was mixed with other ingredients, such as salt, sugar and rice. One said the type of fish used for serving pekasam was sailfish. "We closed the barrel. So that the flies could not enter, if there were danger flies, they would not," said Satu.detikcom witnessing the process of opening the barrel containing the salted fish. The distinctive smell of fish meat that has been fermented in a barrel is so pungent. Then, a number of women from the royal family cleaned one by one the fish meat that was previously preserved in a barrel. After cleaning, the fish meat is dried in the sun.


Photo: dock. detikFood / Sudirman Wamad

After being dried in the sun, continued Satu, the fish meat is cooked to be served as a celebration during the celebration of the birthday or a long fetish ritual later. "The process is the same, it has never changed since time immemorial. The person who made this mark was passed down from generation to generation. Meanwhile, Sultan Sepuh Kasepuhan Palace of Prince Raja Adipati (PRA) Arief Natadiningrat said the fish pekasam was a special dish during a long fetish ritual. is one food for Wali Songo.


Photo: dock. detikFood / Sudirman Wamad

"So it was Wali Songo who ate fish. Then, because Cirebon is also a coastal city, and if in Arabic it might be goat or camel meat. If it's fish here," he said. Furthermore, Arief said fish dishes were served using heirloom plates that had been washed through a long splash ritual.
